722880.name: Senalux Level Pack 2
722880.description:
The 2nd Senalux Level Pack adds another 72 levels to the game. It also introduces rotation-locked hexes which can only be moved but not rotated. Additionally, it contains 5 new optical components:

  • the Diode lets light only pass from one direction
  • the Triangular Mirror reflects light from three sides
  • the Round Splitter cuts a beam in half and reflects it back
  • the Rotating Color Filter blocks colors based on its orientation
  • the Color Changer swaps Blue with Green with Red with Blue
722880.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语
